alert.note: Alert for Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 25 at 7:34PM EST until February 26 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville affecting Owsley County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 22.4 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested, but will continue to run high through early Saturday afternoon. - Action stage is 21.5 feet. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM.
